page.title: 07Golspie-Health Services.
page.content: Health services in Golspie and the surrounding area are provided by the { {Highland Health Board.} The local population are seved by the local{health centre}which is staffed by two general practioners and a health visitor. Golspie also has the only surgical {hospital}in Sutherland,with a resident surgeon.This hospital deals with minor surgery and acts as an out-patients clinic for various consultants who travel north from Inverness on a regular basis. All major hospital care is now centred in the new Raigmore Hospital in Inverness,60 miles away where most hospitalisation takes place.Although most people welcome the facilities in Inverness,they regret that relatives and friends in hospital are so far away from their homes.
